readable.title: 1812525037_528465037c
readable.content: The Kiss-costumed adults are pushing the strollers of the Kiss-costumed kids . The two young children are in black and white facepaint and costumes while riding in a stroller , they are being pushed by a man also in facepaint and a costume Two babies are dressed up as Kiss along with their parent 's . Two little kids in strollers have face makeup on like the band " Kiss " . Two parents with two children and others dressed up like the music group Kiss .
